ModMetaData.name: Android tiers Enchantment
ModMetaData.author: Super-Colliding Super Button
ModMetaData.description:
Android tiers ===Enchantment===
Sprinkle some fairy dust onto some of the gfx
Enchants the following *Things*: * Friendly android base * Hostile android base * Battery gizmo * Skill gizmo * Skymind gizmo * Upload gizmo * Overloead gizmo
Can be added to or removed from a save game.
